history.content:
Political Computer Science Spring 2021 Recruitment

PCS provides students interested in the intersection of technology and politics with a space to tap into both of these backgrounds. We are currently recruiting for both technical and non-technical roles! If you are interested in developing politically-centered tech projects aimed at addressing issues within political systems, PCS is the perfect place for you! Check out our linktree https://linktr.ee/pcsberkeley for the Spring 2021 application, Zoom links, and more information. We are looking forward to meeting you!

Be sure to come to these recruitment events if you would like to learn more about PCS!

Application timeline:

- Information Session (Thursday, January 28 07:00 PST: https://berkeley.zoom.us/j/3722333206 )

- Applications due: Sunday, January 31 at 11:59PM PST (application link @ https://forms.gle/tUH4v46A2WeKveuK9 )

- Zoom coffee chats: January 2- January 3

- Decisions released: January 4

- First GM: January 4 at 8-9PM PST

Don’t forget to apply to join PCS

Link to application: https://forms.gle/tUH4v46A2WeKveuK9

Applications close SUNDAY, JANUARY 31st at 11:59 PM PST As always, please feel free to reach out to me or PCS via email, Facebook, or Instagram if you have any additional questions!
history.subject: Join Political Computer Science (PCS)!
